page.title: 14Pershore Market
page.content:
Pershore Market
Pershore Market was the first co_operative fruit and vegetable market of it's kind in the country and opened in 1920.It was called Pershore Fruit Growers and Traders Association a little earlier in 1909. The market is open 3 days a week Wednesday,Friday and Saturday.There are more foods in the market besides fruit and vegetables.There are fine meats,cheeses,fish and lovely cakes. There is a wholesale fruit and vegetable shop at the back of the market that stays open every day.The market sells fashionable clothes, jewellery,shoes old pots and pans and books,records.At the front of the market there is a pet shop,flowers and plants.The market is in between the High Street and the river.
